content: i am looking at producing some profiles/extensions and need to base my stuff on the 1.4.0 version of FHIR for now. I don't see a tag in svn for that version of FHIR that was published. Was a tag created for that? Is there a slightly newer version of 1.4.0?
2016May is the tag if you want to base on the May 2016 version
just building some profiles for use in canada. and i've taken over some other work that was based on 1.4.0
Corrected build is a fork of 1.4.0 that makes some fixes to generation/validation
